function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainties in modeling efforts for policy design and programmatic orientation","Impact":"Limited ability to respond effectively to VBD scenarios","Mitigation":"Improved modeling techniques and data collection for more accurate predictions","Technologies":"Advanced data analytics, machine learning, and simulation modeling","People":"Public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of incorporation of community-based approaches and diverse issues in VBD strategies","Impact":"Ineffective mitigation of future VBD spread in urban and rural populations","Mitigation":"Incorporating community-based approaches, addressing multidisciplinary issues, and promoting community participation","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, data analytics for local knowledge, and integrated planning tools","People":"Local communities, public health organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, local authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate response to global commitments in addressing VBD scenarios","Impact":"Failure to effectively mitigate VBD spread in the context of climate change and poverty","Mitigation":"Incorporating VBD agendas in national adaptation policies and public health agendas","Technologies":"Climate modeling, data analytics for policy design, and impact assessment tools","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, international organizations"}]}
